attributes.action: provide a fair wage for people on new deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently people on the New Deal programme can be put into work placements where they are expected to turn up and work as a regular employee however they will only recieve jobseekers allowance + a top up of up to £15.38.  In many cases this results in placements working for less then the minimum wage.
